content: quickie cell phone cozy this is a quickie 30 minute crochet project…i have a motorola motoslvr l7 cell phone i have a terrible habit of just tossing my phone into my purse to keep the phone from getting scratched i made this quick little cozy to protect my phone to make the cozy materials a minimal amount of tlc cotton plus mine was hot pink and an i crochet hook  chain 11 sts  half_double_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook and in each across chain 1 and turn - 10 sts  half_double_crochet across all 10 sts chain 1 and turn  repeat from to until piece measures approximately 9 inches  next row/top flap slip_stitch in the first two stitches half_double_crochet across the next 6 sts chain 1 and turn leaving last 2 sts unworked  half_double_crochet in all 6 sts chain 1 and turn  repeat the last row 7 times more finishing sew up the sides of the pocket and sew in all ends sew a small button in the front center to match where you want the flap to close no buttonholes are necessary i just used a space between half_double_crochet stitches to push the button through you are done -fasten_off
